articles.author: Sunita Iyer
articles.title: Revealed: What Harvard professor Avi Loeb, searching for remains of interstellar object, found - Asianet Newsable
articles.description: While looking for the remains of the first known interplanetary object to fall to the Earth, a Harvard University scholar discovered some promising material. Two weeks ago, Professor Avi Loeb began a dredging expedition to search the Pacific Ocean's depths fo…
